str.o: The restricted file system makes a users real home directory available to her. Useful for FTP sites.
Hide path to the home directory

If set, the user's home directory will be available as the root of this file system. If not set the user's home directory will be available as its normal path, just as on an ordinary FTP site.

If the users home directory is /home/me/ and the restricted file system is mounted on /ftp/ the home directory will be available as /ftp/ if this option is set and as /ftp/home/me/ if it is not set.
